website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few concerns, choose this sunscreen if you want long-wearing protection and a big bottle that will last.
pros: Provides SPF 50 in a generous 18 oz
Antioxidant cellular response technology for healthy looking skin
cons: It's oil-free, but still has a bit of a greasy feel on the skin
Fragrance is on the strong side

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this exact brand of sunscreen before and it’s worked well. I think I received a fake. It does NOT work. I’ve tried it on a number of occasions. Such a waste!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stains clothing yellow
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen has great sun protection, a pleasant scent, and is moisturizing. The downside is that the avobenzone creates yellow or reddish-orange rust stains on clothing. One pair of bathing suit bottoms was stained to the point of being ruined and I had to bleach any white fabric that came in contact with it. Oxyclean makes the stains much worse (bright orange!) and bleach is the only way to get it out. I don't wear white when I use it, or I try to wait 15 minutes before getting dressed and then bleach my shirts after.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Supergoop is super good!
customer_reviews.text: I wear sunscreen everyday being a blonde hair, light skin, brown eyes and living in Texas. I tried so many body sunscreens and finally found this product is the perfect balance of sun protection and moisturizer! It has a nice light smell, emollient, but not greasy. It's a great value for the size. If you wear sunscreen daily, give this one a try! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great suncreeen, but Amazon should update the product picture
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and in good condition. It has your typical lotion-like consistency, but it doesn't leave your skin looking greasy and it has a very faint lemony smell that masks an even more faint sunscreen smell. You won't be able to smell these unless you put wherever you applied it directly under your nose. I would recommend Amazon to update the product picture. The bottle I received does not match the active or inactive ingredients shown on the pictures Amazon provided; however, they do match the ingredients shown on the official Supergoop site, so this is a legitimate product. I assume Amazon just hasn't updated the picture to fit the product's current formula.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love but got a horrible chemical burn/rash on my face,neck,chest and arms from this product. I’m a fair skinned redhead so i always wear sunscreen. This one obviously won’t do.
customer_reviews.author: Lizard

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't sting your eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I work and workout outdoors often. Over the years, I have tried "every" other sunscreen available on the market -- even the "pink" stuff made for babies/kids. Result? They all wind up travelling into your eyes if you sweat or rub your face/eyes. The sting is painful and lasting. Also, many other sunscreens are hard to rub-in and can leave your face looking ghostly white. Supergoop is no joke! It rubs in easily, does not sting your eyes, blocks the sun and moisturizes. Incredible product -- easy five star and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Feels more like a high quality moisturizer than a sunscreen and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Literally the only sunscreen I've used and never gotten a sunburn with. Feels more like a high quality moisturizer than a sunscreen and the scent is very mild. Works well even when sweating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Citrus scent is lovely, perfect consistency
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting the slight citrus scent which I find so nice, especially since most sunscreens smell like the beach (ugh!). It glides on nicely and absorbs quickly. No white cast (but I'm fair/olive toned depending on how much sun I'm getting). It's also super lightweight which is a major plus!
customer_reviews.author: Anna L.

customer_reviews.title: Confusing order details, but excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I think the 7.5 fl oz tubes come in a 3-pack, which would make those cheaper per oz. Than this bottle (22.5 oz total vs 18oz). I am disappointed because I didn't read the oz. size of the bottle closely when I ordered, and thought it was going to be a larger amount than when I ordered the 7.5 oz tubes- which came as a 3-pack even though nothing on the description says so. I wish I could keep this bottle and get a reimbursement for the difference in price as I have now have less product for more money!
customer_reviews.author: Eco mega mom

customer_reviews.title: Great pump and not greasy
customer_reviews.text: Our family really likes this sunscreen. We live in Arizona and need sunscreen daily. The pump in this makes it so much easier to apply. The sunscreen is also not greasy like typical sunscreen. It goes on more like lotion which makes it easier to spread. It is pricey but we find it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia A. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Not the authentic product
customer_reviews.text: Really really oily and greasy. I’ve been using this product for years and I have not ever had this problem. I tried to give it more time but unfortunately I’m out of the return window, otherwise I would return. I would advice to purchase this product elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: CAUSED ME TO BREAKOUT
customer_reviews.text: I had already been using supergoop products and loving them but when I ordered from here the formula started giving me breakouts. I will continue to use on my body since I'm past my return window but definitely not my face. And by the way I do not have sensitive skin so it's rare for me to have a reaction to any product.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette H.

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite Sunscreen. I used to use the smaller facial ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Sunscreen. I used to use the smaller facial bottle size and then found this. I used to go through the small bottles so quickly. This size is great for me, it lasts forever. I love the consistency of the lotion, its not too thick, not runny. It doesn't have a scent that annoys me like some of them do. I mix it with my BB cream and it seems to last all day. I bought this for my sister to start using too, so obviously if I recommend this product for people I care about, I recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE FEEL
customer_reviews.text: Rubs in very quickly, non-greasy, pleasant scent. Got the big pump bottle to keep in the garage so I will remember to use it before going out.
customer_reviews.author: M Simon

customer_reviews.title: Best suntan lotion I have used.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I am a 56 year old male. This is easier to spread than any other lotion I have used. Very minimal greasy feel which went away fast. Provided great protection and did not leave me smelling like some phony coconut tree.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen was perfect for my sensitive skin. After a week at the beach I typically have bumps from chemical sunscreens and that was not an issue this year. It spreads well and protected me from burns. Another great thing is that it does not stain clothing like a chemical sunscreen. The scent is lovely. I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Son had allergic reaction but we love it for the rest of the family
customer_reviews.text: This stuff glides on amazingly and no residue left behind. I bought it because I thought my allergy prone son would be okay with it but he did break out in an itchy rash. The rest of the family loves it though
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunscreen EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear sunscreen daily (well everyone should), but this is a great everyday sunscreen. It smells good, rubs in nicely and doesn't leave you feeling greasy. I use it with my daily moisturizer and sometimes under my makeup and it looks and feels great. Perfect for people with daily sun exposure!
customer_reviews.author: Chad J.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST sunscreen out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best sunblock I've ever used! This is my second time purchasing the BIG bottle and living in Southern California, we go through one of these suckers in about 18 months. We use it on all different skin types - body and face - and it really has saved us from sunburns on more occasions than I can count!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn E. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Greasy causing allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I read numerous great reviews about this product before ordering. Very disappointed. Went on smoothly but never absorbed. Very greasy. My face began tingling and feeling very odd after about 30 minutes. I washed it off, but the feeling continued for quite some time. I don't typically have any type of allergy of sensitivity, but this was awful.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Schomburg

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen ever. First one that I wear on a daily basis. Absorbs well and feels great on the skin. Part of my daily regimen all year long.
customer_reviews.author: Romulus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection, amazing smell, feels good on the skin!
customer_reviews.text: Almost makes up for being over priced! I want to see Super Goop make a zinc-based sunscreen so I can try that.
customer_reviews.author: A#1 USA Good Time Best Fun Buyer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I put it on first thing in the morning. Face and body. You can use makeup over it also. Best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no white cast at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a dark-skinned African American woman and this stuff disappears on my skin! I really love it. It is a little greasy, but I just wait for 5 mins or so and them pat of the grease with a paper towel or other tissue. I wear this every day now.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was not full!!
customer_reviews.text: My lotion arrived today. The bottle was literally 1/3 empty already. The bottle did not leak into the package. It appears the bottle was emptied partially before it shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best sunscreen there is!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST sunscreen - I wear it every single day! It’s easy to put on, doesn’t smell, spreads well and does not leave any reside, AND moisturizes! This is my second bottle and I’ll continue to buy it whenever I run out!
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply. Works well for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: We love this sunscreen! It’s very easy to apply. We use it daily as we live in Florida. I also like the pump bottle...makes it even easier to use!
customer_reviews.author: sunshinejeep

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Ordered after hearing great things and just received. My daughter and I used it and she now has painful raised welts everywhere she applied it! I used it as well and have not had a reaction like that but be careful if you have sensitive skin - this may not be for you! Not what you want to see on your kid. She has used many other random brands of sunscreen and has not had this reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: We love Supergoop, it goes on easy and is very ...
customer_reviews.text: We love Supergoop, it goes on easy and is very light and protects real well the last bottle we bought was 50 spf. Smells good and goes on lightly. We will buy it again when we run out, although there is plenty in this bottle for this year.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Must have for summer
customer_reviews.text: I never take time to do reviews but I love this sunscreen for face and body, adults and children. Every time I wear it people tell me my skin looks amazing, glows without looking greasy. Also we swim everyday and it apply every 1-2 hours and never burn. I also run with this sunscreen and as long as I apply and let is absorb before sweating I’ve never had it run into my eyes. I also feel like I get a great summer glow, without ever burning.
customer_reviews.author: Kjd

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Use every day.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. If there is a smell I don’t notice it (an I smell everything). I have super sensitive skin and use this on chest and hand arms every day. So easy with the great packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Post

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for even the fairest of skin.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for daily use. Unscented and protects even the fairest of skin. Use it as a lotion!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Lilli

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Put this product on prior to working the yard. I was only out there for an hour and a half. Now my face is burned. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Anne

customer_reviews.title: Pump was broken
customer_reviews.text: The pump was broken when it arrived, but the container was completely wrapped with plastic wrap so no sunscreen left the package. I want to return the sunscreen, but the product just oozes out. I'm not sure how to return without dumping all of the sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Only issue was packaging.  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, feels great, protects great. Only issue was when I opened up the package, lotion had leaked everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Good but it stained my clothes so I don’t use it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Feels like moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Moistens skin, does not feel like sunscreen. I am sun sensitive and don’t burn with this sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: schnauzergirl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't protect as well as mineral based sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: If you really want to make sure you're protected opt for the mineral based sunscreens. My whole family has gotten sunburned using this product- mineral based Blue Lizard SPF 30 or Babyganics SPF 50 offer much better protection. It also stings when applied to the face. So wanted to like this!
customer_reviews.author: Amy K. Vince

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the pump bottles all summer. It smells great and goes on easily. I wish it would easily lock though for transport in the pool bag. I end up applying sunscreen to my kids before leaving and then taking another sunscreen for reapplication later.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this sunscreen on the face if you have oily skin. combination skin maybe okay. I understand it is oil free formula but for oily skin, this product does give a little bit sticky feeling on the face. However, this is very good sunscreen for body. It spread and absorb easily.
customer_reviews.author: wildbird

customer_reviews.title: I’m crying over here...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s suppose to do BUT do NOT get in your eyes. I spent over 3 hours trying to get my eyes to stop watering. They were so irritated that it also triggered my sinuses. I will use this for the rest of my body but not for my intended purpose, which was under my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical Boomer Convert
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product might be a bit of hype from Gynneth fans but I am a convert. I am a boomer male who is constantly outside. I find the product to be protective, easy to apply, moisturizing, and not sticky. I bought the jumbo dispenser I was so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: This sunscreen goes on fast and easy during our laborious morning ritual of applying sunscreen x3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 elementary aged kids that attend a day camp at a local lake for 8 hours a day. This sunscreen goes on fast and easy during our laborious morning ritual of applying sunscreen x3 kids and after a month of camp, NOT ONE SUNBURN!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bronson

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I'm baffled by the negative reviews! But ours goes on smoothly, no weird scents, no white film, etc. This is now our go-to sunscreen! My 4yo loves it!
customer_reviews.author: magnum

customer_reviews.title: It's smooth, not grainy!
customer_reviews.text: This goes on like lotion, spreads easy and its nice and creamy! I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Causes Acne
customer_reviews.text: Didn't look at the comedogenicity of the ingredients before I bought this - big mistake. It broke me out like crazy. Now I only use it on my arms and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Smooth not greasy lasting longer than others. For my long rides I have had no sun burns on any exposed dermis.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Trant

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best spf cream I’ve ever used!!! Very light and smells very pleasant, doesn’t make you break out, not sticky and etc etc. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: White people rejoice!! The sun can not harm you no longer!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is a pale gingers dream!! It smells heavenly (kinda like a dreamcicle). I put it on after my morning shower, and I haven’t burned yet! I live in a very hot desert climate, that’s an absolute accomplishment.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: We love the outdoors and the lake
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sunblock I trust!!! Light non greasy and very effective. I am fair and freckle ... We love the outdoors and the lake. I can apply before we head out and be sunburn free at the end of the day! Still getting some color!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love the pump!
customer_reviews.text: I got this sunscreen to keep on our kitchen counter. It's so easy for me, my husband or my kids to remmeber to apply sunscreen everyday when it's out on the counter in a pump! Great coverage too.
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite sunscreen. It is easy to smooth into your skin (like regular lotion - no weird white residue that doesn’t rub in) and provides the BEST sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged and leaking out
customer_reviews.text: This might be a great product, but the shipping process was extremely poor. The bottle was broken open in shipping and leaked into the box. My plans were to travel with this, but not now.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Carl Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Decent sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: My husband actually liked this sunscreen best. It's a decent sunscreen, doesn't leave a white cast and smells ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jinx

customer_reviews.title: Part of my daily routine and great for sensitive skin !
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It doesn’t have the sunscreen smell and it became my everyday sunscreen . It’s very good for sensitive skin ( I am acne prone and eczema ) . Do recommend this sunscreen to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Tobon

customer_reviews.title: Super-wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I run 4-6 miles a day and love having such a big bottle of sunblock to use. The pump is awesome and makes it much easier to apply to my kids and myself. It blends in very well and I have not had any problems with sun burns!
customer_reviews.author: K. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Love this! My whole family uses it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My whole family uses it! Does not feel greasy and you don’t have that weird sunscreen sweat going on.
customer_reviews.author: JK1023

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the only sunscreens that doesn't make me break out or sting my sensitive skin. It provides great coverage and kept us all sunburn free this summer!
customer_reviews.author: L. Currey

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen bottle had spilled when received
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was open and had spilled everywhere out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Liu

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite sunscreen ever.
customer_reviews.text: It smells SO GOOD, and feels like lotion on my skin - not thick and pasty like most sunscreens! Can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Great sunscreen. Goes on very smoothly and feels lite and not greasy. Offers good protection from the sun
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Very Convenient way to wear sunscreen everyday and it smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Lal

customer_reviews.title: Do I need to return this item to get the PA+++
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my sunscreen but the bottle doesn’t state that it has PA+++ like the description does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Supergoop SPF 50 Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I personally like it, easy to use, and yes it is a little watery than my usual sunscreen (sport coopertone). protected me and my family, no one had sunburn, will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Talis

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection without the typical sunblock smell.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Much better deal when you buy the 18oz size. My only complaint is that the container leaked a small amount in transit, but not enough to warrant returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: John Foster

customer_reviews.title: Super Goop different container before...
customer_reviews.text: New product usually buy super body goop/ will rate at later date... after I use...
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cumens

customer_reviews.title: Bed stuff
customer_reviews.text: My skin on my face is itchy and covered in red spots. Ingredients cause cancer! Product phone number is bogus. Very BED
customer_reviews.author: Lesyapol

customer_reviews.title: One of my three kids broke out in a head ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my three kids broke out in a head to toe rash 2x with this sunscreen. I was hoping it would be a beach staple for our family, but not with the allergic reaction :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Great product...
customer_reviews.text: Great product however the most product of the product leaked out. NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: PAM K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for use on arms
customer_reviews.text: Great for use on arms, legs, etc. Continue to use higher SPF for face. Larger size makes it economical for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Macdiarmid

customer_reviews.title: Nice odor, easy to use pump!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pump so I don't forget to apply daily. It doesn't have a strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Ockey

customer_reviews.title: Best for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: No streaks and no burning sensation for this sensitive skinned girl! Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Great protection , love the size only downside for me is tht when using in on the face leaves it with some shine that I don t like.
customer_reviews.author: marika

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen. A little goes a long way and it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen. It's smooth and doesn't leave a white cast.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight--no scent
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight without the typical sunscreen scent--I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: AP NYC

customer_reviews.title: Love this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described and arrived when promised. I love this sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm hooked! Went to Mexico for a week and for the first time ever, didn't get burnt. This stuff works like a dream, even after swimming in the ocean for an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Non-greasy
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Non-greasy and easy pump dispenser is a total win!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Falk

customer_reviews.title: Caused red welts
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen caused red welts to develop all over my daughter. It burns your eyes if it gets near them. Not as great as everyone says.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Great sunscreen Spreads very easily and super concentrated Lasts forever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: Favorite sunscreen. Light, not sticky, and stays on even when it water. I play a great deal of tennis and this is my go to sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: James Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen is terrific however the cap was not tight and it arrived with sunscreen all over the interior packaging. What a mess!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: It works, use daily!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find an everyday body moisturizer with sunscreen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Burt Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this sunblock
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this sunblock. Not sticky at all and not super think. Goes on like lotion but works really great. I bought this after skiing at Vail for a week in Colorado and they had it all around for the kids ski school. Works so great I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Erika A.

customer_reviews.title: I was completely amazed.
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin and I went camping for a whole week on the beach and did not get any sun burn. I was completely amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Reid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Their products are great, we use this all summer long!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Use it everyday in sunny Florida
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Use it everyday in sunny Florida. No smell, great moisturizing formula.
customer_reviews.author: Susie V. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome sunscreen that is very light but works well.
customer_reviews.author: kristi geer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen. It has a pleasant smell that quickly dissipates. It doesn't leave your skin feeling oily at all and it doesn't rub off on your clothes or the interior of your car. I live in Arizona and wear this during our 115 degree summers. I haven't gotten burned while wearing this. It also does great while swimming. I love this suncreen!
customer_reviews.author: eliebellie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is applied easily and doesn't transfer to clothing like other sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: J. Towery

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen I've ever used. Non greasy and so easy on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia95

customer_reviews.title: Pump makes it very easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Pump makes it very easy to apply. Only one we use.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan McLean

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but packaging failed
customer_reviews.text: Just received my order. I love this product but this shipment leaked all over the box. Not sure how much product I list due to the leak. Sad!
customer_reviews.author: L8884

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products that we have tried. Does the job and then some.
customer_reviews.author: NorwayNick

customer_reviews.title: Sad that the public school kids know the value of ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item for a public high school sailing team. A member of a visiting private sailing team stole it after we had it only a week. Sad that the public school kids know the value of things and the private school kids feel entitled to steal things that don't belong to them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hersey

customer_reviews.title: Really wonderful, non-greasy
customer_reviews.text: Really wonderful, non-greasy, high SPF protection that's great for face and body. I use it on my face, neck, chest, and hands everyday as a daily SPF and lotion. It doesn't leave a film on top of your skin like a lot of higher spf lotions, and it's great for use with makeup
customer_reviews.author: My Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Watered Down
customer_reviews.text: It was very watered down. I tried calling Customer Service at Supergoop but they never returned my call. I was quite unhappy with the product as it felt like I was applying water on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: This sunscreen does not work and is too greasy
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes about this sunscreen but I was very disappointed. First off it’s super greasy and not lightweight at all! I definitely couldn’t wear it daily because I felt oily and sticky. Also the sunscreen is worthless! I put this stuff on and was out it the sun for maybe an hour and I got the worst sunburn. It did not work at all. Thankfuly I didn’t use it on my five year old. It’s not worth $50! I had better sun protection using my Alba Botanicals. I returned this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The best and doesn't sting the eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stuff and on top of everything it is rear lly nice to finally have a sunscreen that doesn't sting the eyes. Found out about this after hearing the owner interviewed on public radio. Love that this has safe ingredients, the citrus scent is nice though very mild, leaves skin soft, absorbed beautifully. Really a perfect product. Now if the container could have been glass instead of plastic, it would have been outstanding, but you know, it's recyclable so that something. Definitely prefer this over other sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: RPCV 2002

product_meta.title: Supergoop! Everyday Play SPF 50 Lotion, 18 fl oz - Broad Spectrum Sunscreen for Sensitive Skin - Fast-Absorbing, Water & Sweat Resistant Body & Face Sunscreen - Athlete-Trusted, Great for Active Days
product_meta.description:
The Supergoop! original. This water-resistant formula is perfect for everyday use on face and body. It's fast-absorbing and lightweight, but with ultra-moisturizing results. And, it's made with natural extracts of citrus, basil, and bois de rose, so you'll leave that typical sunscreen smell behind. Active ingredients - avobenzone 3%, homosalate 10%, octinoxate 7.5%, octisalate 5%.

BRAND STORY
By Supergoop!
feature_bullets: Superpowered SPF; Supergoop! Broad Spectrum Sunscreen absorbs both UVA(ging) & UVB(urning) rays so your skin doesn’t; Our lightweight formula doesn’t feel sticky or leave a “white-cast”; Light, refreshing scent smells amazing

Perfect For Active Days; Our Everyday Play SPF 50 sunscreen features an athlete-trusted, sting-free formula; Hydrating, feel-good formula absorbs easily and is great in all conditions; Water- & sweat-resistant up to 80 minutes

Best-In-Class Ingredients; Everyday sunscreen includes sunflower and rosemary leaf extracts (packed with beta carotene and antioxidants) that nourish and protect your skin; Supergoop! feels so good you’ll actually want to wear it Every Single Day

Your New Healthy Habit; Skin damage develops from sun exposure over time, not from one sunburn; We believe your skin should feel light, soft & beautiful with your everyday sunscreen; With Supergoop! it’s easy to make SPF part of your daily ritual

Experts In SPF; At Supergoop! we reimagined what SPF could be, and we continue to create the best protection out there; Our clean, effective formulas feel good on your skin; Healthy skin starts with daily SPF
